tool_description: Controls prosodic elements including intonation, rhythm, stress patterns, and pauses to create natural-sounding speech with appropriate emotional expression.

input_text.description: Text for prosodic analysis and control

voice_profile_id.description: Voice profile identifier for prosodic matching

emphasis_words.description: Words to emphasize with special stress

pause_style.description: Pause insertion style: minimal, natural, or dramatic

error_messages: Invalid emotion intensity: Value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Voice profile not found: The specified voice profile ID does not exist.
Invalid pause style: Use minimal, natural, or dramatic.
Text analysis failed: Unable to perform prosodic analysis on the provided text.
usage: Provide input_text and voice_profile_id. Optionally adjust emotion_intensity, specify emphasis_words, and set pause_style. Returns prosodic control data for synthesis.

prosodic_markers.description: Text with prosodic markup for synthesis

stress_patterns.description: Stress patterns for each word or phrase

pause_locations.description: Character positions where pauses should be inserted
